verses.verse: ( In My Father’s House Are Many Rooms) Μὴ <WG3361> Mē [“] Do not let ταρασσέσθω <WG5015> tarassesthō be troubled . ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἡ <WG3588> hē - καρδία <WG2588> kardia hearts πιστεύετε <WG4100> pisteuete You believe εἰς <WG1519> eis in τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God ; ( Or Believe in God) καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . εἰς <WG1519> eis in ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me πιστεύετε <WG4100> pisteuete believe

ἐν <WG1722> en In τῇ <WG3588> tē - οἰκίᾳ <WG3614> oikia house τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Πατρός <WG3962> Patros Father’s μου <WG1473> mou My μοναὶ <WG3438> monai rooms . πολλαί <WG4183> pollai many εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are εἰ <WG1487> ei If δὲ <WG1161> de - μή <WG3361> mē [it were] not εἶπον <WG2036> eipon would I have told ἂν <WG302> an so , ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that πορεύομαι <WG4198> poreuomai I am going [there] ἑτοιμάσαι <WG2090> hetoimasai to prepare τόπον <WG5117> topon a place ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin for you ? ( Or If it were not so, I would have told you. I am going there to prepare a place for you.)

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if πορευθῶ <WG4198> poreuthō I go καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἑτοιμάσω <WG2090> hetoimasō prepare τόπον <WG5117> topon a place ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin for you , πάλιν <WG3825> palin back ἔρχομαι <WG2064> erchomai I will come καὶ <WG2532> kai and παραλήμψομαι <WG3880> paralēmpsomai welcome ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you πρὸς <WG4314> pros into ἐμαυτόν <WG1683> emauton My presence , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where εἰμὶ <WG1510> eimi am . ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I καὶ <WG2532> kai also ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ἦτε <WG1510> ēte may be

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὅπου <WG3699> hopou to the place where ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō am going . ” ( BYZ and TR And where I go you know, and the way you know.) οἴδατε <WG1492> oidate You know τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ὁδόν <WG3598> hodon way

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Θωμᾶς <WG2381> Thōmas Thomas ( The Way, the Truth, and the Life) Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie “ Lord , ” οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἴδαμεν <WG1492> oidamen “ we do not know ποῦ <WG4226> pou where ὑπάγεις <WG5217> hypageis You are going , πῶς <WG4459> pōs [so] how δυνάμεθα* <WG1410> dynametha can we τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ὁδὸν <WG3598> hodon way ? ” ‹εἰδέναι› <WG1492> eidenai know

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei answered αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , ‹ὁ› <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Ἐγώ <WG1473> Egō “ I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am ἡ <WG3588> hē the ὁδὸς <WG3598> hodos way καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē the ἀλήθεια <WG225> alētheia truth καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē the ζωή <WG2222> zōē life . οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis No one ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai comes πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father εἰ <WG1487> ei except μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . δι’ <WG1223> di’ through ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou Me .

εἰ <WG1487> ei If ἐγνώκειτέ <WG1097> egnōkeite you had known με <WG1473> me Me , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὸν <WG3588> ton - Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father μου <WG1473> mou My ‹ἂν <WG302> an as well . ᾔδειτε› <WG1492> ēdeite you would know ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ From ἄρτι <WG737> arti now on γινώσκετε <WG1097> ginōskete you do know αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἑωράκατε <WG3708> heōrakate have seen ‹αὐτόν› <WG846> auton Him . ”

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to Him , Φίλιππος <WG5376> Philippos Philip Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie “ Lord , δεῖξον <WG1166> deixon show ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀρκεῖ <WG714> arkei that will be enough ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin for us . ”

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei replied αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Τοσούτῳ* <WG5118> Tosoutō all this χρόνῳ* <WG5550> chronō time , μεθ’ <WG3326> meth’ with ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you εἰμι <WG1510> eimi I have been καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἔγνωκάς <WG1097> egnōkas still you do not know με <WG1473> me Me ? Φίλιππε <WG5376> Philippe “ Philip , ὁ <WG3588> ho Anyone who ἑωρακὼς <WG3708> heōrakōs has seen ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me ἑώρακεν <WG3708> heōraken has seen τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father . πῶς <WG4459> pōs How σὺ <WG4771> sy can you λέγεις <WG3004> legeis say , Δεῖξον <WG1166> Deixon ‘ Show ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father ’?

οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv πιστεύεις <WG4100> pisteueis Do you not believe ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I [am] ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the Πατρὶ <WG3962> Patri Father καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοί <WG1473> emoi Me ? ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is τὰ <WG3588> ta The ῥήματα <WG4487> rhēmata words ἃ <WG3739> ha - ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I λέγω <WG3004> legō say ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you , ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ on ἐμαυτοῦ <WG1683> emautou My own . οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv λαλῶ <WG2980> lalō I do not speak ὁ <WG3588> ho it is the δὲ <WG1161> de Instead , Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi Me , μένων <WG3306> menōn dwelling ποιεῖ <WG4160> poiei performing τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga works . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

πιστεύετέ <WG4100> pisteuete Believe μοι <WG1473> moi Me ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I [am] ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the Πατρὶ <WG3962> Patri Father καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ἐν <WG1722> en [is] in ἐμοί <WG1473> emoi Me — εἰ <WG1487> ei . . . δὲ <WG1161> de or at least μή <WG3361> mē . . . διὰ <WG1223> dia on account of τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἔργα <WG2041> erga works αὐτὰ <WG846> auta themselves . πιστεύετε <WG4100> pisteuete believe

Ἀμὴν <WG281> Amēn Truly , ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly , λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ὁ <WG3588> ho whoever πιστεύων <WG4100> pisteuōn believes εἰς <WG1519> eis in ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἔργα <WG2041> erga works ἃ <WG3739> ha that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ποιῶ <WG4160> poiō am doing . κἀκεῖνος <WG2548> kakeinos vvv ποιήσει <WG4160> poiēsei will also do καὶ <WG2532> kai even μείζονα <WG3173> meizona greater [things] τούτων <WG3778> toutōn than these , ποιήσει <WG4160> poiēsei He will do ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father . πορεύομαι <WG4198> poreuomai am going

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ὅ¦τι <WG3754> ho¦ti whatever ἂν <WG302> an . . . αἰτήσητε <WG154> aitēsēte you ask ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name , μου <WG1473> mou My τοῦτο <WG3778> touto - ποιήσω <WG4160> poiēsō I will do ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that δοξασθῇ <WG1392> doxasthē may be glorified ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the Υἱῷ <WG5207> Huiō Son .

ἐάν <WG1437> ean If τι <WG5100> ti for anything αἰτήσητέ <WG154> aitēsēte you ask με <WG1473> me Me ( TR does not include Me.) ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name , μου <WG1473> mou My ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ποιήσω <WG4160> poiēsō will do [it] .

( Jesus Promises the Holy Spirit) ( ( 500 16:5-16 )) Ἐὰν <WG1437> Ean If ἀγαπᾶτέ <WG25> agapate you love με <WG1473> me Me , τὰς <WG3588> tas - ἐντολὰς <WG1785> entolas commandments . τὰς <WG3588> tas - ἐμὰς <WG1699> emas My τηρήσετε <WG5083> tērēsete you will keep ( Or If you love Me, keep)

Κἀγὼ <WG2504> Kagō And I ἐρωτήσω <WG2065> erōtēsō will ask τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἄλλον <WG243> allon another Παράκλητον <WG3875> Paraklēton Advocate ( Or Comforter or Helper or Counselor; Greek Paraclete; also in verse 26) δώσει <WG1325> dōsei He will give ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἵνα <WG2443> hina to ᾖ <WG1510> ē be «μεθ’ <WG3326> meth’ with ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τὸν <WG3588> ton vvv αἰῶνα» <WG165> aiōna forever —

τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἀληθείας <WG225> alētheias of truth . ὃ <WG3739> ho [Him] , ὁ <WG3588> ho The κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύναται <WG1410> dynatai cannot λαβεῖν <WG2983> labein receive ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv θεωρεῖ <WG2334> theōrei it neither sees αὐτὸ <WG846> auto Him οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude nor γινώσκει <WG1097> ginōskei knows [Him] . ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis But you γινώσκετε <WG1097> ginōskete do know αὐτό <WG846> auto Him , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti for παρ’ <WG3844> par’ with ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you μένει <WG3306> menei He abides καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . ( WH and is in you) ἔσται <WG1510> estai will be

Οὐκ <WG3756> Ouk vvv ἀφήσω <WG863> aphēsō I will not leave ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ὀρφανούς <WG3737> orphanous as orphans ; ἔρχομαι <WG2064> erchomai I will come πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you .

ἔτι <WG2089> eti In μικρὸν <WG3398> mikron a little while καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world με <WG1473> me Me οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi no more , θεωρεῖ <WG2334> theōrei will see ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you δὲ <WG1161> de but θεωρεῖτέ <WG2334> theōreite will see με <WG1473> me Me . ὅτι <WG3754> hoti Because ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ζῶ <WG2198> zō live , καὶ <WG2532> kai also ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ζήσετε <WG2198> zēsete will live .

ἐν <WG1722> en On ἐκείνῃ <WG1565> ekeinē that τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day γνώσεσθε <WG1097> gnōsesthe will know ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I [am] ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - Πατρί <WG3962> Patri Father , μου <WG1473> mou My καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you [are] ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi Me , κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō and I [am] ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you .

ὁ <WG3588> ho Whoever ἔχων <WG2192> echōn has τὰς <WG3588> tas - ἐντολάς <WG1785> entolas commandments μου <WG1473> mou My καὶ <WG2532> kai and τηρῶν <WG5083> tērōn keeps αὐτὰς <WG846> autas them ἐκεῖνός <WG1565> ekeinos - ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὁ <WG3588> ho the [one who] ἀγαπῶν <WG25> agapōn loves με <WG1473> me Me . ὁ <WG3588> ho The [one who] δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀγαπῶν <WG25> agapōn loves με <WG1473> me Me ἀγαπηθήσεται <WG25> agapēthēsetai will be loved ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo by τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Πατρός <WG3962> Patros Father , μου <WG1473> mou My κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō and I ἀγαπήσω <WG25> agapēsō will love αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐμφανίσω <WG1718> emphanisō reveal αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to him . ” ἐμαυτόν <WG1683> emauton Myself

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him , Ἰούδας <WG2455> Ioudas Judas οὐχ <WG3756> ouch (not ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰσκαριώτης <WG2469> Iskariōtēs Iscariot) Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie “ Lord , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τί <WG5101> ti why γέγονεν <WG1096> gegonen . . . ὅτι <WG3754> hoti . . . ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin to us μέλλεις <WG3195> melleis are You going ἐμφανίζειν <WG1718> emphanizein to reveal σεαυτὸν <WG4572> seauton Yourself καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐχὶ <WG3780> ouchi not τῷ <WG3588> tō to the κόσμῳ <WG2889> kosmō world ? ”

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē replied Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Ἐάν <WG1437> Ean “ If τις <WG5100> tis anyone ἀγαπᾷ <WG25> agapa loves με <WG1473> me Me , τὸν <WG3588> ton - λόγον <WG3056> logon word . μου <WG1473> mou My τηρήσει <WG5083> tērēsei he will keep καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πατήρ <WG3962> Patēr Father μου <WG1473> mou My ἀγαπήσει <WG25> agapēsei will love αὐτόν <WG846> auton him , καὶ <WG2532> kai and πρὸς <WG4314> pros to αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him ἐλευσόμεθα <WG2064> eleusometha We will come καὶ <WG2532> kai and μονὴν <WG3438> monēn Our home παρ’ <WG3844> par’ with αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him . ποιησόμεθα <WG4160> poiēsometha make

ὁ <WG3588> ho Whoever μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἀγαπῶν <WG25> agapōn does not love με <WG1473> me Me τοὺς <WG3588> tous - λόγους <WG3056> logous words . μου <WG1473> mou My οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv τηρεῖ <WG5083> tērei does not keep καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὁ <WG3588> ho The λόγος <WG3056> logos word ὃν <WG3739> hon that ἀκούετε <WG191> akouete you hear οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἔστιν <WG1510> estin is ἐμὸς <WG1699> emos My own , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but τοῦ <WG3588> tou [it is ] from the πέμψαντός <WG3992> pempsantos who sent με <WG1473> me Me . Πατρός <WG3962> Patros Father
Ταῦτα <WG3778> Tauta All this λελάληκα <WG2980> lelalēka I have spoken ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you παρ’ <WG3844> par’ with ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . μένων <WG3306> menōn [while] I am still

ὁ <WG3588> ho the δὲ <WG1161> de But Παράκλητος <WG3875> Paraklētos Advocate , τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit , τὸ <WG3588> to - Ἅγιον <WG40> Hagion Holy ὃ <WG3739> ho whom πέμψει <WG3992> pempsei will send ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name , μου <WG1473> mou My ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos - ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you διδάξει <WG1321> didaxei will teach πάντα <WG3956> panta all things καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὑπομνήσει <WG5279> hypomnēsei will remind you of ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas vvv πάντα <WG3956> panta everything ἃ <WG3739> ha . . . εἶπον <WG2036> eipon have told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . ἐγώ <WG1473> egō I

( Peace I Leave with You) Εἰρήνην <WG1515> Eirēnēn Peace ἀφίημι <WG863> aphiēmi I leave ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin with you ; εἰρήνην <WG1515> eirēnēn peace τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἐμὴν <WG1699> emēn My δίδωμι <WG1325> didōmi I give ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you . οὐ <WG3756> ou not καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world δίδωσιν <WG1325> didōsin gives . ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I do δίδωμι <WG1325> didōmi give ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you μὴ <WG3361> mē Do not let ταρασσέσθω <WG5015> tarassesthō be troubled ; ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἡ <WG3588> hē - καρδία <WG2588> kardia hearts μηδὲ <WG3366> mēde do not δειλιάτω <WG1168> deiliatō be afraid .

ἠκούσατε <WG191> ēkousate You heard ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō Me εἶπον <WG2036> eipon say ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin - , Ὑπάγω <WG5217> Hypagō ‘ I am going away , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔρχομαι <WG2064> erchomai I am coming [back] πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you . ’ εἰ <WG1487> ei If ἠγαπᾶτέ <WG25> ēgapate you loved με <WG1473> me Me , ἐχάρητε <WG5463> echarēte you would rejoice ἄν <WG302> an vvv ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that πορεύομαι <WG4198> poreuomai I am going πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father μείζων <WG3173> meizōn greater than μού <WG1473> mou I . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is
